column1: #   XP12RO: SV40-immortalized skin fibroblast derived from patient deficient in XPA
#   XP20S: SV40-immortalized skin fibroblast derived from patient deficient in XPA
#   XP12RO-XPA: XP12RO cell line complemented with XPA
#   XP20S-XPA: XP20S cell line complemented with XPA

column2: HeLa-KO142: HeLa cell line with CRISPR KO of XPA (partial protein expression)

column1: #   HeLA_KO38: HeLa cell line with CRISPR KO of XPA (no protein expression)
